data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick Yokohama FC.
In the minute 2, Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama FC are caught offside.
Throw-in Cerezo.
In the minute 5, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Yokohama FC's Yusuke Matsuo breaks free at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Yokohama FC.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Goal! Hiroshi Kiyotake gives Cerezo a 0-1 lead in Yokohama.
In the minute 14, Toshiyuki Takagi instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Yokohama FC just outside Cerezo's area.
In the minute 18, Yokohama FC drives forward and Kohei Tezuka gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Yokohama FC's Kazunari Ichimi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Cerezo at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Jumpei Iida waits before resuming play because Yuji Rokutan for Yokohama FC is still down.
In the minute 23, Yuji Rokutan is back on his feet again.
Cerezo are coming forward and Eiichi Katayama gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jumpei Iida awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
Goal kick for Cerezo at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC close to the penalty box.
In the minute 27, Masahiko Inoha for Yokohama FC gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Jumpei Iida awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Cerezo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, In Yokohama Cerezo attack through Eiichi Katayama. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Yokohama FC.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 38, Cerezo drive upfield and Tatsuhiro Sakamoto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Yokohama FC defender.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Important block from the Yokohama FC defence as Naoyuki Fujita fires in a strike for Cerezo.
In the minute 40, Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Cerezo's Eiichi Katayama misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Toshiyuki Takagi for Cerezo is whistled offside.
In Yokohama Cerezo drive forward through Eiichi Katayama. His shot is on target but it's saved.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 45, Cerezo's Toshiyuki Takagi is back in action after a slight knock.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Toshiyuki Takagi for Cerezo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 46, Jumpei Iida has blown to start the second-half.
Yasuki Kimoto is replacing Toshiyuki Takagi for the away team.
Cerezo take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Bruno Pereira Mendes.
In the minute 58, That's a fine assist from Hiroaki Okuno.
Tatsuki Seko is on a sub for Kensuke Sato for Yokohama FC.
Takahiro Shimotaira (Yokohama FC) is making a second substitution, with Koki Saito replacing Yusuke Minagawa.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Throw-in Yokohama FC.
Ken Tokura is replacing Bruno Pereira Mendes for Cerezo at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 73, The away team have replaced Hiroshi Kiyotake with Yoichiro Kakitani. This is the third substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
Tatsuki Seko (Yokohama FC) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Yokohama FC's Shunsuke Nakamura gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 76, Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Takahiro Shimotaira is making the team's third substitution at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium with Kosuke Saito replacing Takuya Matsuura.
The home team replace Yutaro Hakamata with Shunsuke Nakamura.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Yokohama FC.
In the minute 79, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 81, In Yokohama, Shunsuke Nakamura of Yokohama FC is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jumpei Iida awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Yokohama to check on Ken Tokura, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 84, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ken Tokura returns to the field for Cerezo after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Yusuke Matsuo keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
Koki Saito with an assist there.
In the minute 87, Kyowaan Hoshi is replacing Kazunari Ichimi for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team have replaced Tatsuhiro Sakamoto with Jun Nishikawa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
At NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Yokohama FC.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Yokohama FC capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Yokohama FC's Yusuke Matsuo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cerezo defender.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Jumpei Iida blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
